dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC 2012 is a dataset used for semantic segmentation, containing images with pixel-level annotations for 20 object classes and one background class.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: Lian Xu
Wanli Ouyang
Mohammed Bennamoun
Farid Boussaid
Dan Xu
dcterms:description: MS COCO 2014 is a large-scale dataset for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, containing images with annotations for 80 object classes and one background class.
dcterms:title: MS COCO 2014
